article_title: Kasich 'Worried About Jeb' Hurting Family Name With Negative Ads

article_metadata.news_keywords: john kasich, jeb bush, hurting, family, name, negative, ads

og.description: Ohio Gov. John Kasich told a group of voters in South Carolina on Thursday he worries former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush may be hurting his family name by his use of negative attack ads, The New York Times reports.
